Control Name: 4.10. Ensure SQL server's TDE protector is encrypted with BYOK (Useyour own key) (Scored)
Control Statement: TDE with BYOK support provides increased transparency and control over the TDE Protector, increased security with an HSM-backed external service, and promotion of separation of duties.
